title: has anyone hit honor level 3 or above
body: i just feel like its taking so long to level my honor up

replies.body:
Pretty sure it's one of those things where it's easier to go down levels than it is to go up. Otherwise everyone will be max level and the new system would be essentially done and dusted.

Also everyone knows you never say anything with a duo or pre made team because if you upset one you're copping atleast one other report to go along with theirs.

I only know that if I recall correctly it is really easy to go back to level 1. This can be a complete misunderstanding, since I can't find a good way to track my current honour.
But a few games ago I was definitely on my way to lvl 3 (e.g. earned a lot of honourpoints). Then I played with a 4 man premade squad in an ARAM and I noticed one of them was playing fairly bad (very agressive resulting in a few quick deaths on his behalve) and I said that in the chat: "wow Yi is pretty bad and shouldnt dive too much" after that I shut my mouth and even supported him with support items.
To my surprise at the end of the game I saw my honourlevel was lvl1, with a white halffilled circle, asif I was at lvl 1 and earned a huge amount, or asif i dropped from lvl2 to lvl1.

I'm still baffled how the honour system works, how you track your honour, and when you degrade in honour rank...
Like Riot said its not something easily earned, it'll take months most likely for anyone to get it.
